name: fall festival mini pumpkins
notes:
knit cute mini pumpkins for your fall décor. use one of our suggested stitch patterns or create one of your own. one mini hank will create one mini pumpkin.

experience level

* advanced beginner

materials

* woolstok (worsted) bundle (100% fine highland wool, 21 mini hanks; 5g/12yds): 1 bundle (fall festival)
* cinnamon stick (for stem)
* stitch marker
* stuffing
* tapestry needle

finished measurments

* circumference: 6” after stuffing
* height: 1” after cinching

color shown

* moss green no. 1326
* earth ivy no. 1309
* gravel road no. 1302
* drift wood no. 1312
* highland fleece no. 1303
* ember glow no. 1323
* rusted roof no. 1311
